short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Runs an WebSocket server to broadcast messages to all clients.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HTTP WebSocket Message BroadCaster

A WebSocket server to broadcast messages to all clients. Can be used for example as a chat application or WebRTC signaling on a LAN.

Based on Google Chrome [app samples](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/chrome-app-samples/tree/master/samples/websocket-server).

Used along with Serverless-WebRTC example: https://github.com/frequent/nexedi-serverless-test
